channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Visible Wireless launches early Black Friday deal with an unlimited data plan for just $19/mo
item.description: It's a great time to check out Visible Wireless - the carrier has just listed an incredible discount for Black Friday.

item.title: Perplexity upgrades Comet to multitask across your tabs
item.description: Google is embedding its Nano Banana AI image model into Search and NotebookLM, with Photos to follow.

item.title: You can now interrupt ChatGPT as it learns to take feedback on the fly
item.description: OpenAI’s new mid-response editing feature for GPT-5 Pro allows real-time updates during AI replies.

item.title: “It’s incredible to revisit this after almost a decade” – step inside Zootopia 2 early with Disney’s new 4D attraction
item.description: TechRadar got an early look at the show and caught up with Zootopia stars Ginnifer Goodwin and Nate Torrence, and Jared Bush, chief creative officer of Walt Disney Animation Studios, to talk about both the attraction and the upcoming sequel.
